Interacting with the Application¶

Activity Interface

This module contains the Activity class, which provides interfaces for interacting with the activity application

class activity.Activty¶
search_exercises(phrase: str)¶

Search the exercises database for a exercises which contain the search phrase.

Parameters

phrase (str) – The string to search for

Returns

A dictiony of the id, name and description of the exercise

Return type

list<dict>

The return object(s) in the list have the following format:

Exercise(id: <id>, exercise_name: <name>, description: <description>)

Converter Interface

Contains the converter class, which provides utilities to convert the input csv file into series for use in analysis.

class converter.Converter¶
get_series(notation: str)¶

convert the notation to a list ready to be converted to a np.series. Returns the attached notes as a string

Parameters

notation (str) – the field as entered in the incoming csv

Returns

(notation, notes)

Return type

tuple<list, str>

Models Interface

Contains models with wrap the database tables in SQLAlchmy ORM

class models.Exercises(**kwargs)¶

The exercises table

class models.Factors(**kwargs)¶

The factor table

Notes Interface

Handles decoding notes and creating the output string

class notes.Notes¶
add_note(note: str)¶

Decodes the note string passed back to a list notes

Parameters

note (str) – The string returned from the converter

Returns

expanded string of ‘english’ notes

Return type

str

clear_notes()¶

Clears the notes
